description: Creates an alias of a flow for deployment. For more information, see Deploy a flow in Amazon Bedrock in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than one time. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: flowIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the flow for which to create an alias.

parameters.name: routingConfiguration
parameters.description: Contains information about the version to which to map the alias. (dict) --- Contains information about a version that the alias maps to. flowVersion (string) --- The version that the alias maps to.

nested_params.name: flowVersion
nested_params.description: The version that the alias maps to.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Any tags that you want to attach to the alias of the flow. For more information, see Tagging resources in Amazon Bedrock. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alias.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the alias was created.

nested_items.name: flowId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the flow that the alias belongs to.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the alias.

nested_items.name: routingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains information about the version that the alias is mapped to.

nested_items.name: flowVersion
nested_items.description: The version that the alias maps to.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the alias of the flow was last updated.
